line_1: And to make perfect what before was scant:
And to make perfect what before was scant:
line_2: So Heaven made Woman to supply the want,

line_1: "And though my portion is but scant,
line_2: "Here to the houseless child of want,

line_1: 'And tho' my portion is but scant,
line_2: 'Here to the houseless child of want,

line_1: Slander, and avarice, and pen'ry scant,
He hoards up his treasures, and thinks himself scant,
line_2: While the poor that's contented ne'er feels any want.

line_1: Receive from niggard fate their pittance scant;
line_2: Content and ease repair, the sons of want
